评论概述: If You Like Dainty, You'll Love These!
评论详情: Love the daintyness of it all! I've recently switch my earring game from statement to minimalist. This value pack (because the price point is outstanding) of 3 different styles is exactly what I needed in my jewelry box. I find myself leaning more toward the studs lately but it varies week to week. If you have been wanting to try a more minimal less bulky look and style to your earring game, look no further!

评论用户: Good product. Easy to put together.

I love that these earrings came in a combination/pair of three. When I wear earrings I like when they match, and when they taper from large to small. I feel like they look very elegant and classy. Good quality and great price! Would buy from this company again!

I love tiny delicate jewelry, especially earrings. This set of three pairs of earrings is definitely a great value. The earrings are well made and do not tarnish or cause earlobe irritation. I love how they sparkle in the sun and add just a simple touch of style to my outfit!

评论概述: Effortless Sparkle at a Great Price
评论详情: Love these cute and simple stud earrings. With enough to fit up to six earring holes, they effortlessly add sparkle, making any outfit look more put together.
Beautiful and trendy set. Size is great and very comfortable to wear. No irritation.
Love the earrings....
Very cute and classic. The packaging was a little weird. It comes in a little box with plastic wrap as the top and bottom so when I opened it up everything bounced out all over the floor.
I have no worries about these earrings opening. Super comfortable and cute. I love how dainty and clean they look.

These are great earrings to leave in without having to worry about itching. They're cute, they haven't made my ears itch for a whole day of wearing them, and they're small enough that they didn't bother me while I was sleeping. They do come with a rubber back which isn't my favorite but that's my only complaint. They're perfect for my second piercing to leave in all the time.

These earrings are fine. I hit the set with plain gold hoops, gold hoops with cz, and cz studs. I was hoping the hoops with czs would be great, but unfortunately the crystals have no sparkle. It’s more likely I’ll use the plain gold pair, maybe in my second hole. The studs are decently sparkly. The earrings seem like decent quality, they are not overly cheap looking. I’m still on the hunt for some tiny gold Huggie hoops with sparkly cz stones… haven’t found any yet!

I'm very happy with this set of gold earrings. I chose the hoop and stud set. The hoops are easy to clip on and off and I love the pair with the sparkly cubic zirconium. The studs are great for a second or third piercing. It's a really nice set worn together, or separated to be worn with other earrings in my collection. The color is a nice warm gold tone, not brassy or too yellow. Plus, they come in a cool box! :) Just perfect!

So sparkly, so dainty, and they have the no-slip rubber backs on them, so I wasn't afraid to sleep and/or shower in them.  Everything I'm looking for in a triple set!  They'll probably replace my graduated cubic zirconia or graduated pearls as my travel set.

This set is cute and the quality seems good enough, but the leaf studs need to be mirror images of each other to look the same on both ears, but they’re not. The hoops are a little bigger than I thought they would be, but that could just have to do with ear size or piercing placement.
Pretty and the different lengths are nice.
Such a cute earring set! These are exactly what I was looking for. The earrings are simple yet beautiful and will match anything. Good quality and I love wearing them

These earrings feel delicate and beautiful. I haven't had any trouble with discoloration of either my skin or the jewelry, which is rare for me! I love having such a variety to choose from, so I'm not wearing the same set to work every day. The earrings attach by hinging halfway through, you insert the peg through your ear, and then the back snaps up onto the peg. The attachment feels very secure, and I wouldn't worry at all about one falling off.
The description of these earrings is factual- dainty,  gold plated and hypoallergenic. These earrings do not feel cheap and the gold plated quality looks like real gold.

I'm very happy with these earrings!  They are very comfortable and cute, just the right gold color.  The sparkle is good but not overwhelming.  They feel secure too.  We'll see how they wear over time; I'm optimistic but for this price I'm not sure.  So far so good though!
